AboutPage.title: About iny.one
AboutPage.metaDescription: Learn about the purpose, vision, and future of iny.one, a lightweight and free URL shortener.
AboutPage.intro: iny.one is a free and lightweight URL shortener, designed for marketers, developers, and content creators who need to easily track campaigns using UTM parameters.
AboutPage.why: This project was born from the need to share clean, trackable links without relying on heavy platforms. I wanted to build a fast, privacy-focused and useful tool.
AboutPage.contact: Have ideas or found a bug? I’m open to feedback.

faqs.a: It’s a free tool to shorten URLs and add UTM parameters for better campaign tracking.
Yes, the service is completely free and does not require registration.
UTM parameters let you track the origin of web traffic in your marketing campaigns.

faqs.q: Can I see stats for my links?
faqs.a: Not yet, but we’re working on it.
We don’t collect or store personal data. Shortened URLs are used only for redirection.
